sentence.Network_en: One metre of fabric is sufficient to cover the exterior of an 18-in-diameter hatbox.
sentence.Network_cn: 一米布足以包裹住直径为18英寸的帽盒。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 日常英语分类词汇_百度文库 ... handbag 手提包 hatbox 帽盒 cosmetics case 化妆箱.

entry.def: A hatbox is a cylindrical box in which a hat can be carried and stored.

means.word_mean: 1. a round piece of luggage for carrying hats

auth_sentence.content: Susan succumbed to a nineteen-thirties Parisian hatbox and a pair of Chinese ivory masks.
auth_sentence.res_content: Susan succumbed to a nineteen-thirties Parisian hatbox and a pair of Chinese ivory masks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Susan succumbed to a nineteen-thirties Parisian hatbox and a pair of Chinese ivory masks.
